synopsis.text: The catastrophic teleportation event in the Fittoa region has far-reaching consequences for the kingdom of Asura. Princess Ariel Anemoi Asura finds her life in peril when a mysterious mage named Sylphiette suddenly appears in the royal palace. Having witnessed Sylphiette's immense magical power, Princess Ariel recruits her as a personal bodyguard and sets her sights on claiming the throne. However, the path to power proves treacherous. Political intrigue and deadly magic threaten Princess Ariel's ascension as she contends with her siblings for the crown. Guided by her new protector, the enigmatic Sylphiette, Princess Ariel navigates the cutthroat world of Asuran nobility. Only through cleverness, ruthlessness, and their magical bond can the pair achieve Ariel's ambition in the fallout of the teleportation calamity that shook the kingdom.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
